text: Eadward cing gret Stigand arcebisceop & Harold eorl & mine sirrefen & ealle mine þeines freondlice.

& ic kiðe eow þæt ic habbe geunnen Criste & Sancte Petre into Certeseige & þan abbot Wlwolde þæt hundred of Goddelie swo freo & swo forð swo ænig is freost þe beoð on mine onwealde mid ealle þinge þe to me beolimpað on wde & on felde.

& ic wille þæt se abbod beo his saca wurðe & his soca & tol & tem & infangene theof & griðbruche & forestel & hamsoca & flemene formthe binne porte & buten beo lande & beo strande ofer ealle his man & ofer his lande.
